name: frontinjf.github.io
description: Este é o repositório oficial do site do FrontInJF. E o principal objetivo é divulgação dos encontros e eventos relacionados com FrontEnd em Juiz de Fora.

scripts.start: concurrently "npm run dev:server:site"  "npm run dev:server:blog"  "npm run sass:watch"
scripts.build:site: npm run build:css && npm run copy
scripts.copy:img: cd dest && mkdir img && cd .. && cp -r ./src/site/img/* ./dest/img
scripts.copy:js: cd dest && mkdir js & cd .. && cp -r ./src/site/js/* ./dest/js
scripts.install-global-dependencies: npm install browser-sync -g && npm install node-sass -g && npm install -g concurrently && npm install -g hexo-cli
scripts.install-all-dependencies: npm run install-global-dependencies && cd core-blog && npm install
